bug.author: lpaatero
bug.description: NeuralNetConfiguration.Builder method learningRateScoreBasedDecayRate sets parameter lrScoreBasedDecay, but this parameters is not used anywhere. It looks like method learningRateScoreBasedDecayRate should be either removed or implemented.

comments.comment: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
